page.title: 09POP by ALASTAIR WALTER
page.content: To start our report on music in the 80's we did a survey within our class to find the favourite pop artist or band. The results were as follows:-1. {Wham}- 7 2.{Ultravox}- 3{Howard Jones - 3{Shakin Stevens}- 3{Madonna}- 3 {Queen}- 1{Duran Duran}- 1{Status Quo}- 1{David Bowie}- 1{Tears for Fears}- 1. Pop music is played on{Radio 1}mainly and can be a powerful thing as was seen at Christmas 1984 and on the 14th July 1985 with{Band Aid}and{Live Aid. When the world was first really shown the horror of the famine in Ethiopia {Bob Geldorf}lead singer of{the {Boomtown Rats}decided he had to do something about it. So he organised a gathering of any pop stars that cared to come and recorded a record called {"Do They Know it's Christmas"}all profits from this record went to help the starving.
